description:
The powerful foes of the Element 4 and Iron Dragon Gajeel have been crushed by Natsu and the gang! All that`s left is Jose, named as one of the Ten Wizard Saints. Erza puts everything on her own shoulders and challenges him, but faced with his overwhelming magical power it was only a matter of time until she was defeated. But just then, Makarov returns after having regained his magical power! This battle which has caused such sadness... With anger and pride in his heart, what spell does Makarov pull out?! The light of righteousness will now pass judgment upon thee!!
Source: crunchyroll
